## Libraries
```{r}
library(dplyr)
```

## Create table
```{r}
sheet1 <- data.frame(StationNr = NA,
                     SampleNr = unique(spmatrix$SampID),
                     Latitude = NA,
                     Longitude = NA,
                     Biotope_class = NA,
                     PredictedYN = NA,
                     Region = NA)

sheet1 <- sheet1 %>%
  mutate(StationNr = as.integer(sample_info$VL[match(SampleNr, sample_info$SampID)])) %>%
  arrange(StationNr)
```
